text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the scenario where the German Distributor attempts to file in German court. It states that the client can apply to the English High Court for an anti-suit injunction to restrain the German proceedings, noting that post-Brexit, English courts have regained the power to issue such injunctions against EU member states like Germany. Furthermore, the response correctly notes that the German court itself, under ยง 1032 ZPO and the New York Convention, should dismiss or stay the action if the dispute falls within the scope of the arbitration agreement, which the response argues it likely does.", "criterion_id": "50faad98-d961-4c12-a76b-ce59b94c7973"}
